name: Arrow-1.8.2021
description:
Final update, planning on moving to another project, but enjoy the last additions.

Third update of arrow! (An angry-birds ripoff inspired game made for practice)

Downloadable Version:

https://www.mediafire.com/file/zj7lgm1ejjdeaos/ARROWdownloadable182021.zip/file Controls:

> Simply drag the arrow and aim towards the enemies.

> Press 'R' to quickly restart the current level

> Press 'A' or 'D' to traverse levels

> Pressing keyboard numbers from 1-0 summons entities, including crates, enemies, etc.

Changes:
  • Added 4 more levels. total being 10.
  • Added the ability to summon objects, meaning you can create your own levels (good luck tho)
  • Added backgrounds for each sector.
  • Added explosive chickens.
  • Completed all the enemies' behaviors
  • Bla bla
  • Added wooden spikes that are only dangerous to the arrow and enemies. unlike metal spikes which anything it touches fking dies.
  • Backgrounds are layered and have their own parallax, including the ambient particles.
  • some other junk idk
Known bugs:

- cockroach

- insect

- ant

- mosquito

- fly
